latestAction.text: On agreeing to the Roukema amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

Mr. Lehman (FL) raised a point of order against the Roukema amendment (A003). Mr. Lehman stated that the provisions of the amendment constituted legislation on an appropriations bill and was, therefore, in violation of the rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.

Mr. Ford (MI) raised a point of order against the Roukema amendment (A037). Mr. Ford stated that the provisions of the Roukema amendment create new spending authorities in violation of the Budget Act. The Chair sustained the point of order.
On agreeing to the Roukema amendment (A033) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to the Roukema amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
